https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pGzHw5Guzjoi9F4l3s4V05yY2d3.jpg Alone and far from home, The Kid makes his way through a strange city looking for the means to get through his day. Surrounded by predators he is forced to make compromises merely to survive, his life of exile grows one day longer. A Drowning Man
